home.title: AI Mock Interview Practice
home.subtitle: Practice makes perfect - simulate real interview scenarios with AI
home.resumeSupported: Supports PDF, PNG, DOC or DOCX formats
home.resumeDropzone: Click to upload or drag files here
home.jobDescriptionSubtitle: Enter job description, AI will generate relevant questions based on this information
home.customQuestionsSubtitle: You can add specific questions, or leave empty to let AI automatically generate suitable questions based on interview type
home.interviewTypeSubtitle: Choose interview type, AI will automatically generate corresponding professional questions (if you haven't customized questions)

interviewTypes.generalDesc: Comprehensive interview questions covering background, strengths, career planning, etc.
interviewTypes.technicalDesc: Professional technical questions, suitable for engineers and technical positions
interviewTypes.behavioralDesc: Situational and behavioral questions to assess soft skills and teamwork abilities

home.fillCandidateName: Please fill in candidate name to start practice (questions are optional, AI will automatically supplement)
home.noInterviews: No interviews yet. Create your first mock interview to get started!

ai.title: AI-Powered Questions
ai.description: Generate intelligent questions based on your interview type and requirements

realtime.title: Real-time Feedback
realtime.description: Get instant feedback on your responses to improve your performance

analytics.title: Detailed Analytics
analytics.description: Track your progress with comprehensive performance analytics

interviewDetail.title: Interview Details
interviewDetail.questionsDescription: The candidate will be asked the following questions:
interviewDetail.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this interview?
instructionsList: Take your time to read each question carefully
Submit when all questions are answered
AI evaluation will be provided after submission

takeInterview.title: Interview Session
takeInterview.confirmFinish: Are you sure you want to finish the interview? You won't be able to modify your answers afterwards.

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.subtitle: Stay up to date with all the latest features, improvements and fixes.
changelog.footerMessage: We continuously update and improve AI Interview Platform to provide you with a better interview experience. If you have any suggestions or questions, feel free to contact us anytime!
